timeline.headline: Phelim Bradley
timeline.text: BSc Physics 2012 | MPhil Computational Biology student

date.headline: Graduated Christian Brothers College
date.text:
Graduated with maximum points (600/600) in top 0.2% of the country.

Selected to compete in the National Physics and Chemistry Olympiads

date.headline: Accepted into University College Cork to study a B.Sc in Physics and Astrophysics
Graduated with a B.Sc First Class Honours in Physics from University College Cork
date.text:
Transcript

1st Class Honours

Received the John A. Delaney Memorial Prize in Physics for the best performance in Physics

Awarded title of College Scholar and additional scholarship.

date.headline: First scientific paper published
date.text:
How Kondo Holes Create Intense Nanoscale Heavy-Fermion Hybridization Disorder - (Proc. Nat'l Acad. Sci. 108, 18233 - Nov 2011)

Published Article Download PDF

asset.caption: Electronic structure of Kondo holes in the Th-doped heavy Fermion compound URu2Si2 is visualized sith STM to find heterogeneous hybridization strength in nanoscale

date.headline: Presented at Cal Educamp, University of California, Berkeley
date.text: Search and find â€“ Metadata in Learning Resources.

date.headline: Completed Final Year Project with Nanotechnology Group Tyndall National Institute, Cork
date.text:
Researched Conductance correlation analysis of feedback-controlled electromigration of nanoscale wires

Final Report Final Presentation

Supervisor: Dr. Aidan Quinn

date.headline: Metadata standards in online open educational resources
date.text:
Overview of Metadata Standards for Learning Resources: Lessons for the Learning Resource Metadata Initiative

Supervisors: Prof. Jim Pitmann Ast. Prof Brian Carver

date.headline: Won a Box.net sponsored hackathon at the Stanford Ventures Initiative hackspace.
Weak Interactions Group, UC Berkeley
date.text:
Designed using SolidWorks part of a very low temperature apparatus

Completed 3 month machine shop course

date.headline: Undergraduate research Davis Group, Cornell University, Ithaca NY
date.text:
MatLab analysis into Heavy-Fermion Hybridization Disorder.

Worked with SolidWorks design program(CAD) on an improvement for the STM

date.headline: Physics Lab Teaching Assistant. University College Cork
date.text: Lab demonstrator teaching introductory experimental physics to 1st year Biomedical Science students

date.headline: Computational Physics Teaching Assistant. University College Cork
date.text:
2nd year physics computational physics lab

Course taught through MatLab

date.headline: Resident Assistant, International House Berkeley. UC Berkeley.
date.text:
Assessed and responded to the needs of over 500 residents

Acted as a liaison between residents and Department of Residence Life

Counseled peers on personal, academic, and career concerns

Managed various administrative duties including maintenance requests, incident reports, and room transfers

Enforced and upheld residential halls policies

Ref : Maribel Guillermo

date.headline: Irish Young Entrepreneur StartUp Final
date.text: One of the final 6 candidates in the Irish Young Entrepreneur StartUp final

date.headline: Private Tutor in Physics, Maths and Science (to ages 15-20)
date.text:
Taught in group and individual sessions designing individual curricula

Taught levels ranging from high school physics and math to introductory 3rd level physics

date.headline: Reading Computational Biology at Fitzwilliam College Cambridge
date.text:

date.headline: Illumina Internship
date.text: Worked at Illumina on a project on 'Learning models for predicting the quality of genetic variant calls from DNA sequencing data'

date.headline: DPhil Genomic Medicine and Statistics Trinity College Oxford, UK
date.text: Wellcome trust funded graduate program at the Oxford Centre for Human Genetics
